content: HAI-LabSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationHuman-AI Interaction Laboratory HAI LABThese are HAI-LAB's Main Research Questions!Welcome to Human-AI Interaction Laboratory at Sungkyunkwan University!Human-AI(Artificial Intelligence) Interaction Laboratory, or HAI-lab for short, is a research group in the Department of Interaction Science and the Department of Applied Artificial Intelligence, Sungkyunkwan University, Seoul, Korea.Our research aims to understand the interaction between human and new media (e.g., artificial intelligence, robots, games, social media, mobile phones, etc.) and use them as persuasive and educational vehicles to promote attitude or behavior change in various domains such as healthcare, well-bing, education, finance, etc. The researches that our lab conducts are primarily empirical study; we mainly use experiment and survey to answer the research questions. The main research topics of our lab include, but not limited to:Media Psychology / Social and Cognitive Psychology / Human Factors / Human-Computer Interaction.Health Communication / Education / PersuasionIf you’re interested in working with us, please email us with a description of your research interests and copy of your CV (if possible).Google SitesReport abusePage detailsPage updated Google SitesReport abuse
